snippet.title: Just Get Through Greenlight Gameplay - 2014
snippet.description:
New Trailer: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=xuCzUH3ArK4
Get  'Just Get Through' here: http://getjgt.retrific.net
Thank you for your support! You can now get Just Get Through on Steam!
http://store.steampowered.com/app/338190

Just Get Through is a randomly generated jump'n'run featuring Upgrades, Explosions, Traps, Walljumping and more.

Features in the game just get through v1.0.2: 
• Consistent Style 
• Beautiful particles and effects 
• Achievements 
• Sandbox Mode 
• Of course now microtransactions or shit like that 
• Free Updates and additional content 
• Save and Play Custom Levels ! 
• Unlockable Colorpalettes 
• Throwable TNT to destroy walls or traps 
• Online Highscore 
• Gamepad Support 
• Endless fun in different randomly generated levels 
• Upgrades 
• Destructible Environment 
• Permadeath 
• and much more

This was exclusive early 1.0.2 "Just Get Through" footage.

Please upvote my game Just Get Through on Steam Greenlight, or at least, don't downvote it :D
Thanks for supporting my new game studio retrific!

Here are some social links:
https://www.facebook.com/Retrific
https://twitter.com/Retrific
http://www.twitch.tv/retrific
http://www.indiedb.com/company/retrific
http://retrific.itch.io/

Trailer Credits:
Music:
"Club Diver" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com) 
Licensed under Creative Commons: By Attribution 3.0
http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/
